effects_structured.raw: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks up to 100.
Energize stack generation increases by 75% during dashes, lunges, blinks, and while moving in stealth.
When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 100 bonus physical damage on-hit.
When fully Energized, your next basic attack slows the target by 99% (melee) or 20% (ranged) for 0.75s.
